precondition: The "Start" menu is open and the mouse cursor is hovering over the "Control Panel" option.
action: Keep the mouse cursor hovering over the "Control Panel" option.
expected_results: The "Control Panel" option will remain highlighted.

precondition: The Windows XP Start Menu is open.
expected_results: The Control Panel window will open.

precondition: The Windows XP Control Panel is displayed in Category view.
action: Hover the mouse pointer over the "Appearance and Themes" category icon.
expected_results: The description text box below the category icons will update to display information about the "Appearance and Themes" category.

precondition: The "Appearance and Themes" window is open within the Windows XP Control Panel.
The "Display Properties" window is open and the "Screen Saver" tab is visible.
expected_results: The "Display Properties" window will display the "Screen Saver" settings. A preview window showing a black screen with the text "Windows XP" will appear. Options for selecting and customizing the screen saver, wait time, password protection, and monitor power will become available.

precondition: The "Screen Saver" tab of the "Display Properties" window is open.
action: Click the down arrow of the "Screen saver" dropdown menu.
expected_results: A dropdown menu with a list of available screensavers will appear.

precondition: The "Screen Saver" tab within the "Display Properties" window is open. The "Screen Saver" dropdown menu is open.
action: Click the "3D Flower Box!" option within the "Screen Saver" dropdown menu.
expected_results: The "Screen Saver" dropdown menu will close. The preview will update to the "3D Flower Box!" screensaver. The "Wait" time will change to "10" minutes.

precondition: The "Display Properties" window is open and the "Screen Saver" tab is selected.
action: Click the "Power" button in the "Monitor power" section.
expected_results: The "Power Options Properties" window will open, and the "Power Schemes" tab will be selected.

precondition: The "Power Options Properties" window is open and the "Home/Office Desk" power scheme is selected.
action: Click the dropdown button labeled "After 20 mins" next to the "Turn off monitor" option.
expected_results: A dropdown menu will appear, displaying a list of time intervals ranging from "After 1 min" to "Never".

precondition: The "Power Options Properties" window is open. The "System hibernates" dropdown menu is expanded, displaying a list of time intervals.
action: Click the "After 5 hours" option in the "System hibernates" dropdown menu.
expected_results: The "System hibernates" dropdown menu will display "After 5 hours" as the selected option. The "Power Schemes" dropdown menu will change to "Home/Office Desk" and all power-saving options within the "Power Options Properties" window will be reset to "Never".

precondition: The "Power Options Properties" window is open and the "Power Schemes" tab is active. The "Power schemes" dropdown menu should be visible.
action: Click the dropdown arrow of the "Power schemes" list box.
expected_results: The "Power schemes" dropdown menu will expand, displaying a list of available power plan options.

precondition: The "Power Options Properties" window is open and the "Power Schemes" tab is active. The "Power schemes" dropdown menu is visible.
action: Click the "Always On" item in the "Power schemes" dropdown menu.
expected_results: The "Save As.." and "Delete" buttons will appear to the right of the "Power schemes" dropdown menu.

precondition: The "Power Options Properties" window is open. The "Power Schemes" tab is selected. The "Always On" power scheme is selected.
action: Hover the mouse pointer over the dropdown button next to the "Turn off hard disks" setting.

precondition: The "Power Options Properties" window is open and the "Always On" power scheme is selected.
action: Click on the dropdown menu labeled "Turn off monitor" under the "Settings for Always On power scheme" section.
expected_results: A dropdown menu will appear, displaying a list of time intervals. The currently selected option, "After 20 mins", will be highlighted.

precondition: The "Power Options Properties" window is open and the "Always On" power scheme is selected.
action: Click the menu item "Never" in the "System hibernates:" dropdown menu.
expected_results: The system will be set to never hibernate automatically.

precondition: The "Power Options Properties" window is open with the "Cancel" button highlighted.
expected_results: The "Power Options Properties" window will close.

precondition: The "Display Properties" window is open with the "Screen Saver" tab selected.
action: Click the "OK" button at the bottom of the window.

precondition: The "Appearance and Themes" window is open in the Windows XP Control Panel.
action: Click the close button of the "Appearance and Themes" window.
expected_results: The "Appearance and Themes" window will close.
